thread.title: The high cost of avoiding war in Syria
thread.title_full: The high cost of avoiding war in Syria - The Washington Post

author: Richard Cohen
title: The high cost of avoiding war in Syria
text: A migrant and a baby arrive at the Greek island of Lesbos after crossing the Aegean sea from Turkey on Monday. (Aris Messinis/Agence France-Presse/Getty Images) By Richard Cohen Opinion writer October 5 at 7:44 PM In the desperate fight against the Islamic State, the Pentagon has it all wrong. It has been using color coding to designate the eligibility of various Syrian rebel groups to receive U.S. aid. According to the
